name: Pengunner Reloaded
description:
Pengunner Reloaded is an far-from-faithful remake to a failed passion project. Or, if that doesn't mean much to you, it's a shmup with items and perma-death.

The game is under development, and updates may release soon. Currently, we have:

  • Three characters with unique mechanics and abilities
  • Three areas with exclusive enemies and bosses
  • Over thirty enemies; three bosses
  • Twenty-five items that permanently change your run (for better or for worse)
  • Endless difficulty scaling that will eventually kill you (I hope)
